sentences.en: ...the Breeders' Cup, run Oct. 26 at Arlington racetrack near Chicago.
sentences.cn: …育马者杯比赛，于10月26日在芝加哥附近的阿灵顿赛马场举行。

sentences.en: A position a distance from the inside or center, as a playing field or racetrack.
sentences.cn: 界外,外侧位置:远离, 如运动场或跑道的内部或中心的位置.

sentences.en: Every year since 1875, this race has been held at Churchill Downs racetrack in Louisville, Kentucky.
sentences.cn: 自1875年以来, 这场赛事每年都在路易斯维尔市邱吉尔唐斯的赛马场上举行.

sentences.en: How about going to the racetrack?
If his team can manage 100 bits, racetrack could replace hard drives.
sentences.cn: 如果他的团队能够成功传输100比特, 那么跑道就能代替硬盘了.

sentences.en: Indeed, he refers to the technology as a magnetic racetrack.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 他将这一技术称作磁赛道.

sentences.en: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to Century Racetrack!
sentences.cn: 女士们,先生们, 欢迎光临世纪赛马场!

sentences.en: Many people dream of scorching round a racetrack.
sentences.cn: 许多人梦想能绕着跑道飞奔。

sentences.en: Racetrack table with chairs. Stretch table to add or remove chairs.
sentences.cn: 带有椅子的椭圆桌. 可拉伸桌子以添加或删除椅子.
获胜者快速通过终点线.
这条河在这一点变窄了.

sentences.en: The turns on the racetrack were steeply banked.
sentences.cn: 赛车道的拐弯处都筑成了倾斜的路面.

sentences.en: To sprint around a racetrack as a means of exercise. Used of a racehorse.
sentences.cn: 遛(马)作轻快小跑:让马绕跑道小跑作为一种锻练的途径.

sentences.en: To sprint around racetrack as a means of exercise. Used of a racehorse.
sentences.cn: 遛(马)作轻快小跑:让马绕跑道小跑作为一种锻练的途径. 用于赛马.

sentences.en: You can't cross the road—it's like a racetrack.
sentences.cn: 那条马路像赛车道一样，你不要横过那条马路。

trans.tran_en: a track on which runners or cars race
